items.title: Data Science for Sports - Sports Analytics and Visualization
items.headline: Learn how to perform sports analysis using Python.
objectives_summary: Learn how to perform analysis of different kinds of sports data using the 2018 NFL season data.
Learn how to visualize sports statistics.
Learn how to create a sports field and visualize players on top of it.

objectives_summary: Understand the Scientific Python Ecosystem
Understand Data Science, Pandas, and Plotly
Learn basics of NumPy Fundamentals

items.title: Interactive python dashboards with Plotly Dash 2021
items.headline: Learn to create interactive python dashboards having navigation bars, data cards, plots and more using plotly Dash
objectives_summary: Create interactive python dashboards using Dash plotly
Mobile responsive layouts for the dashboards
Create interative graphs that are clickable

visible_instructors.title: Gopal Prasad Malakar

items.headline: Master: Association rules (MBA) & it's usage, Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) for classification & variable selection
objectives_summary: Students will know what is association rules (Market Basket Analysis)?
How do association rules work?
How to do market basket analysis using Excel & R

items.title: Taming Regular Expressions (REGEX) - A Complete Guide
items.headline: Regular Expression (Regex) examples in Python, PHP, HTML5, Sheets and PowerShell for you to practice on.
objectives_summary: This Regular Expressions (Regex) course is not only designed to teach you regex but also designed to hone your knowledge by giving you real-world examples.
Understanding regex is a powerful tool to have at your disposal and is a crucial skill set for IT professionals and people whose jobs entail data analysis.
Regex is critical in using the full scope and functionality of some of the world’s most popular languages such as Python, PowerShell, Javascript, PHP etc.

items.title: Modern Data Analysis Masterclass in Pandas and Python
items.headline: Build your Data Analysis and Visualization skills with Python’s Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib and Seaborn Libraries
objectives_summary: Master advanced Python tools to manage, sort, and visualize data.
Learn how to use key Python Libraries such as NumPy for scientific computing and Pandas for Data Analysis.
Master Matplotlib and Seaborn libraries to visualize data, gain valuable insights, and make informed decisions.

Learn the Five Categories of Machine learning.
